word: G3415 - μνάομαι - mnáomai - mnah'-om-ahee - Be mindful

sections.paragraph: to remember, to keep in mind, to call to mind; to be concerned about: to be remembered

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Middle voice of a derivative of G3306 or perhaps of the base of G3145 (through the idea of fixture in the mind or of mental grasp); to bear in mind, that is, recollect; by implication to reward or punish: - be mindful, remember, come (have) in remembrance. Compare G3403.
